subject: Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The Lions will be without defensive tackle Shaun Rogers, who was suspended by the N.F.L. for four games on Wednesday for violating its policy on anabolic steroids and related substances.
snippet: The Lions will be without defensive tackle Shaun Rogers, who was suspended by the N.F.L. for four games on Wednesday for violating its policy on anabolic steroids and related substances.
